title: "How to use showmaker"

## 1. Install

Check [release page](https://github.com/jhk0530/showmaker/releases) to download

## 2. Markdown Files

### Header

Header **must** include `title`, `author`, `format`, `embed-resources` like below

```markdown
---
title: "This is title"
author: "Author"
format: revealjs
embed-resources: true
---
```

### Body

- Each page will divided by `#`

```markdown
# Title of page1

# Title of Page2

```

For more information, see [Quarto presentation](https://quarto.org/docs/presentations/)
